author: carlucci
msg: RAVE-303: refactor usage of PageService.addNewDefaultPage for security reasons.  New Behavior - when a new user is registered a default page is no longer created at registration time.  Now, anytime the PageController is hit and the user has zero existing pages, a new default page will be created for the user.  I also moved the service tests into the impl package since they were incorrectly located.

author: szetszwo

author: veithen
msg: Use the feature introduced by AXIOM-114 to take into account the namespace declarations on the SOAP envelope and body.
